faqs.question: What can I play on the Retroid Pocket 5 out of the box?
faqs.answer: The RP5 runs Android, so it comes with access to the Google Play Store. You can install games directly from there or use it to download emulators. To play retro games, youâ€™ll need to install your own legally obtained ROMs. Check the Guides page for setup tips and recommendations.

faqs.question: What operating system does the RP5 use?
faqs.answer: The RP5 runs Android 13 by default, but it also supports Linux through the custom Rocknix OS (in development).

faqs.question: Can I connect Bluetooth controllers to the RP5?
faqs.answer: Yes! The RP5 supports Bluetooth controllers like the 8BitDo or GameSir. It also works with USB controllers via the official dock. Check the Accessories page for suggestions.

faqs.question: How do I update or install emulators on the RP5?
faqs.answer: You can install emulators directly from the Play Store or sideload APKs. Check the Emulation page for downloads and setup guides for each system.

faqs.question: Where can I find the full specs for the RP5?
faqs.answer: Head over to the Specs page for detailed information about the hardware and performance.

faqs.question: Is there a community where I can ask questions or get help?
faqs.answer: Yes! Join us on r/retroid or the Retro Handhelds Discord to connect with other RP5 users.
